title: Release
description: The action packed conclusion to the Submerged Sun Trilogy...While the citizens of Marin eagerly await the birth of Laurenâ€™s child, Miranda and Marko must deal with the pain and heartache of banishment and being forced to live on land.But when the bodies of young women begin to wash up on beaches all over the world, their legs mutilated in a telling way, Miranda and Marko become desperate to return to the glittering underwater city.Because if Damir is back to his evil ways, then Miranda's sister, Lauren, is in grave danger.Will Miranda and Marko return to the city in time to save Lauren?Or is Lauren, and the entire city of Marin, doomed already...
author: Vanessa Garden
